thread.title: Rangers notes: Jerry Dineen set for expanded role
thread.title_full: Rangers notes: Jerry Dineen set for expanded role

title: Rangers notes: Jerry Dineen set for expanded role
text:
Buy this photo 
CHICAGO — Expect to hear more about Rangers video coach Jerry Dineen. 
In addition to the new 3-on-3 overtime, this season marks the debut of a coach’s challenge for goals scored on potential offside plays or goalie interference, or goals disallowed by goalie interference. 
Dineen, monitoring four angles of each play, will be the one advising coach Alain Vigneault on whether to use his one challenge per game. 
Vigneault said he was comfortable with how the process will work. 
"We had a conference call the other day [with the NHL]," Vigneault said. "It was explained pretty well." 
RING RECEIVED: Backup G Antti Raanta, who played 14 games for the Blackhawks last season before being supplanted on the roster by Scott Darling, received his Stanley Cup ring Wednesday at the United Center from the team’s vice president of hockey operations Al MacIsaac. 
Raanta was a member of the Blackhawks’ practice squad through their postseason run but, after he made comments in a Finnish newspaper this summer that were translated to English as he was rooting against the team in the playoffs, the organization chose not to engrave his name on the Cup. 
"To see all the different people who are working in the building and with the Blackhawks’ organization, it will feel a little weird," said Raanta, who may start Friday at Columbus. "But it’s part of the business." 
BRIEFS: Forwards Emerson Etem and Tanner Glass, and defenseman Dylan McIlrath were the Rangers’ healthy scratches. … Ex-Rangers center Artem Anisimov made his Blackhawks’ debut after being acquired from the Blue Jackets. … Defenseman Trevor van Riemsdyk, 24, of Middletown, was in the Blackhawks’ opening-night lineup for the second straight season. Injuries limited him to 18 regular-season games last season, though he returned to play in the Cup Final against the Lightning.
